#!/bin/bash
awk '{ if [ temp -ne $1 ] 
       then temp = $1; big[$1] = $2
       fi
       elif [temp -eq $1] then if [$2 gt $big[$1] ] big[$1] = $2 ; fi 
       fi

     }' plots.dat
